content: I think the gaming headset or a new game release would be a great gift for my nephew. Thanks for the suggestions! By the way, I recently scored a great deal on a designer handbag at the Nordstrom Rack private sale event, and I also found a great pair of boots on sale for 50% off, which I ended up wearing to a friend's wedding the following weekend. Do you have any fashion tips on how to style a winter coat, I just got a new one from ASOS during their 30% off sale?
